mapper.select: select apply_type as applyType, user_id applyUser, project_id projectId from apply_info where project_id = #{projectId} limit 1;
select apply_type as applyType, u.username applyUser, project_id projectId from apply_info a inner join user u on a.user_id = u.user_id where approval_status = 0 ;
select distinct project_id as projectId, approval_status as approvalStatus, apply_type as applyType from apply_info where user_id = #{userId}

select count(id) from apply_info where project_id = #{projectId} and approval_status = 0 and valid_status = 1
limit 1;
